purpose: Provide a photorealistic 3D indoor scene dataset for research in spatial AI and machine perception.
principle: Captures 3D environments using advanced photogrammetry techniques, providing detailed spatial data for AI research.
reusability: Data can be used for training and benchmarking AI models in spatial understanding and photorealistic rendering tasks.
limitations: Limited to the predefined set of indoor scenes; not suitable for real-time applications due to data size.
name: Replica-Dataset
description: The Replica Dataset v1 as published in https://arxiv.org/abs/1906.05797 .
highlight: High-quality 3D indoor scene dataset for photorealistic rendering and spatial AI applications.
